channel.title: Players
channel.description:
Whenever two players are in the same region, both players get logged out and this is printed in the client console:
[code]RS2 user client - release #317 Error: Error packet size mismatch in getplayer pos Error: T2 - 81,65,81 - 4,3211,3421 - 0,0,28,127,[/code]
any idea on how to fix?
Note: Two players can be logged in at the same time, but as soon as they can see each other they log out and it prints that.

item.title: Players
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Whenever two players are in the same region, both players get logged out and this is printed in the client console:

RS2 user client - release #317 Error: Error packet size mismatch in getplayer pos Error: T2 - 81,65,81 - 4,3211,3421 - 0,0,28,127,

any idea on how to fix?

Note: Two players can be logged in at the same time, but as soon as they can see each other they log out and it prints that.
